detail_desc: Set with a triangle bikini top and bikini bottoms. Top with a double frill at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps with a frill trim and ties at the back. Bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trim at the top and high cut at the back.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and flared hems.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cut-out sections at the sides.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping jacquard weave with a sheen. High waist with narrow, covered elastication and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with covered elastication at the waist and side stripes.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lined, lace-trimmed cups that shape the bust and provide light support. Hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.

One-button jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette. For matching trousers, look for: 0533000.

Suit trousers in a stretch wool weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and concealed button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Umbrella in transparent, printed plastic with a plastic handle. Length 77 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and a sailor collar with a decorative bow at the front.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed cuffs.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a glittery text print. Decorative tie detail at the hem.
Dress in soft modal and cotton jersey with a wide, smocked neckline, short sleeves with smocked trims and smocking at the waist.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in Tencel™ lyocell with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Hair scarves in an airy, patterned weave that can be tied around the head or neck. Size 11x110 cm.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, gathered seam at the front and long sleeves.
Fitted, sleeveless, calf-length dress in a rib knit with a double-layered turtle neck and slits in the sides of the hem.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Vest top in printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the armholes and slits in the sides.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
Leggings in patterned jersey with flatlock seams and a high waist with covered elastication.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and contrasting colour double sleeves.
V-neck tunic in woven fabric with a fastener at the top, wide, 3/4-length sleeves, slits in the sides and a rounded hem.
Swimsuit with a deep V-neck, lined cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Polo-neck jumper in a cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bikini briefs in soft modal jersey with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Set with a strappy top and pair of shorts in a rib knit. Top in a narrow cut at the top with short shoulder straps and an overlocked hem. Shorts with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and overlocked hems.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Cardigan in a fine knit with shiny metal buttons, and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Low ankle boots in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Dressing gown in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and tie belt at the waist. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide, softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Pull-on jeans in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Sleeveless dress in slightly stretchy cotton denim with a collar, buttons at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and short butterfly sleeves with broderie anglaise. Unlined.

Short dress in a viscose weave with lined cups and a sweetheart neckline with a small frill trim. Short puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the hems, smocking at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Wash bag in printed, transparent plastic with a closure at the top for practical storage of items such as wet swimwear. Size 22x32 cm.
Fitted dress in jersey with glittery threads, narrow shoulder straps and a draped neckline at the front. Lined.
Trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Wide trousers in ribbed jersey with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Long satin kimono with a lace yoke and short, wide sleeves with a lace trim. Concealed tie and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Wide turned-up hem with an appliqué.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long, wide sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sports jacket in fast-drying fabric with a print motif at the top, stand-up collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Raglan sleeves with contrasting colour mesh panels down the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Metal earrings with a plastic bead pendant. Length 4 cm.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with a chest pocket, side pockets with a frill detail, and back pockets. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a fake fly and press-studs at the sides.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Flip-flops with patterned soles and straps with punched-out letters.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in a patterned cotton weave with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and a back pocket.

Shirt in easy-iron premium cotton with a cut-away collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the narrow cuffs and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small, gathered stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a high, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
